title: Be Easy
lyrics:
6 ContributorsBe Easy Lyrics[Intro: Brazy]
Attends, she keleva
Whine your waist, o da bi rubber
Me and you, I think its fate
You be custard and I'll be cake

[Verse 1: Odeal]
Patience is a virtue
But it's virtually useless
To text me how you feel
The feeling's mutual, come see me
Girl come see me, girl come see me
Girl come—

[Verse 2: Odeal]
All them risky test that you be sending not a screenshot
Down for the cause, that's what I love
It's so easy, it's so easy
It's so easy, it's so easy
It's so easy, it's so easy
It's so—

[Chorus: Brazy]
Attends, she keleva
Whine your waist, one corner
Cheat on me, I will cheat on you
Two in a team and I choose you
Attends, she keleva
Whine your waist, o da bi rubber
Me and you, I think its fate
You be custard and I'll be cake
Attends, she keleva
You might also like[Verse 3: Odeal]
Pineapple juice when you facetime me
You need a man with his head screwed on
And I got the best head pon my shoulders
Flip you round like rollercoaster
When there's no place on the roster
Make room for you baby, excuses don't phase me
Your bumper go crazy
When you turn 180, girl drop your location
I'm on my way, yeah

[Chorus: Brazy]
Attends, she keleva
Whine your waist, one corner
Cheat on me, I will cheat on you
Two in a team and I choose you
Attends, she keleva
Whine your waist, o da bi rubber
Me and you, I think its fate
You be custard and I'll be cakeEmbed
